title: Nice Hotel, Nicer Staff
text:
This hotel has a great location, a few minutes walk away from Termini Station and nearly directly across the street from Santa Maria Maggiori Church. I had a very nice single room with a modern, well-stocked bathroom. The complementary breakfast buffet was excellent, with a great and varied selection of items. Another nice feature is that there are complementary croissants, blood orange juice, and an espresso machine that the guests may enjoy throughout the day. However, the best aspect of this hotel was it's kind and helpful staff. These people who work at Hotel Raffaello are the nicest hotel staff that I have encountered and did their utmost to make my stay pleasant and I can't thank them enough for all that they did for me. I would definitely stay here again.
Room Tip: I have no suggestions but I did not encounter any street noise during my stay. See more room tips
